sentence.Network_en: If we have to litigate, we will.
sentence.Network_cn: 迫不得已的话，我们会提起诉讼。

sentence.Network_en: The new law also grants them the right to litigate.
sentence.Network_cn: 新法还赋予他们诉讼权.

sentence.Network_en: Both parties agreed to settle their out of court rather than litigate.
sentence.Network_cn: 双方均同意庭外和解而不提起诉讼.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 《Friends》词汇表B ... litigious adj. 好诉讼的, 好争论的 litigate v. 提出诉讼 integrity n. 正直, 诚实, 完整, 完全, 完整性.
legacy 这个词的构词法。_百度知道 ... legislature n. 立法机关 litigate v. 提起诉讼；打官司 litigation n. 诉讼；打官司.

list.abs: 成绩单课程翻译参考总表 ... 税法 Taxation Law 诉讼法学 Litigation Law 知识产权学 Theory of Knowledge Property Right.
行政诉讼(Administrative litigation)行政诉讼是解决行政争议的一项重要法律制度,是指公民、法人或其他组织认为国家行政机关及工作人员的具体行政行为侵犯其合法权益时.
...概念的专门术语。如criminal liability（刑事责任）,misdemeanor（轻罪),civil litigation（民事诉讼）等,这些术语通常不会在其他语域中出现。
法律英语专业词汇汇总 ... 刑事案件 criminal case 刑事诉讼 criminal litigation 行政诉讼 administrative litigation.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin litigat- 'disputed in a lawsuit', from the verb litigare, from lis, lit- 'lawsuit'

entry.def: To litigate means to take legal action.

example.ex: ...the cost of litigating personal injury claims in the county court...
example.tran: 在县级法院打人身伤害索赔官司的费用

example.ex: If we have to litigate, we will.
example.tran: 迫不得已的话，我们会提起诉讼。

means.word_mean: 2. institute legal proceedings against; file a suit against;

sentences.sentence: "He was warned that the district attorney would process him"

auth_sentence.content: The company says it has no plans to litigate in the field.
auth_sentence.res_content: The company says it has no plans to litigate in the field.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The company says it has no plans to litigate in the field.

auth_sentence.content: In her current job as in-house counsel, I actually don't litigate.
auth_sentence.res_content: In her current job as in-house counsel, I actually don't litigate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In her current job as in-house counsel, I actually don't litigate.

auth_sentence.content: If my water goes bad I will have to litigate to recover for damages.
auth_sentence.res_content: If my water goes bad I will have to litigate to recover for damages.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If my water goes bad I will have to litigate to recover for damages.
